sentences.sContent: The king promised to hold a great feast for all his people.
sentences.sCn: 国王允诺为全体子民举行盛宴。

sentences.sContent: The Jewish feast of Passover began last night.
sentences.sCn: 犹太人的宗教节日逾越节昨晚开始了。

sentences.sContent: the feast day of St. Francis

phrases.pCn: 尽情欣赏；尽情享受；大吃大喝
n. 节日；斋日；宗教节日

trans.tranOther: a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion
